change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Louis John Frederick Jaeger was a ferryman and adventurer. He operated ferry across Colorado River at Yuma, Ariz., 1850-1877. Collection includes part of holograph letter from nephew announcing Jaeger's death in Washington, D.C., dated July 1, 1892.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Louis John Frederick Jaeger letter (AZ 528). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Ferryman and adventurer; operated ferry across Colorado River at Yuma, Ariz., 1850-1877.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Part of holograph letter from nephew announcing Jaeger's death in Washington, D.C., dated July 1, 1892.

relatedmaterial.p: Related materials may be found at: AZ 133, AZ 134, AZ 135, and AZ 136.
